about.title: About This Interactive CV
about.message: This interactive CV is an experiment in using AI to make resumes more engaging. It uses simple RAG (retrieval-augmented generation) for context retrieval, and an LLM to answer questions.  It was a weekend project to try to turn the classic two-page resume into something more useful without forcing the reviewer to read a giant document, and make the experience a little more engaging. The source code is open source and available on GitHub.
